Engaging Representations is a UCT Computer Science Honours project built by Simon Newham and Chris Mudongo. This tool seeks to measure your reaction to viewing different types of content, in order to asses its immediate and long term impact on decision making.\n\nCopyright Â© University of Cape Town

at any time and without having to give a reason for withdrawing and
